metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5790 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An integer overflow leading to an incorrect capacity of a buffer inJavaScript in Google Chrome prior to 73.0.3683.75 allowed a remote attackerto execute arbitrary code inside a sandbox via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
